title: TimePeace Mario 64 Power Wear
summary: PixelEight's first release is a tribute to Mario 64. The hour is the Health Bar!
developerAddress:
10130 Mallard Creek Rd Suite 300
Charlotte, NC 28262
description: PixelEight's first release is a tribute to Mario 64. Using the UI of the Health from Mario 64 for the hour and minute as well as second hands.  Ambient mode is a black and white version of the Health emblem with high glancability!  Get your new android wear watch face today for FREE!
descriptionHTML: PixelEight's first release is a tribute to Mario 64. Using the UI of the Health from Mario 64 for the hour and minute as well as second hands.  Ambient mode is a black and white version of the Health emblem with high glancability!  Get your new android wear watch face today for FREE!
